name: KAIROS, Battle for Seconds
description:
KAIROS is a top down action shooter. 
You'll have to chose some bonus and malus, and use them when you have the opportunity !

The ancients had 2 words for TIME.
CHRONOS is a perpetual and unrelenting order.
KAIROS is an opportune time for action.
The 10 deities of Seconds wish to help Kairos defeat Chronos.

CONTROLS:
  •  MOVE : wasd - zqsd - arrows
  •  SHOOT : left click
  •  DASH : right click
  •  PAUSE GAME : P - Esc
